metadata.title: SEBSCC Nutrient and Chlorophyll Data

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description: Biogenic nutrient (nitrate, nitrite, ammonium, phosphate and silicate) and Phytoplankton chlorophyll data were collected from CTD/rossette casts on selected SEBSCC cruises on the  SE Bering Sea shelf.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The purpose of the nutrient and chlorophyll data collection was to assess the nutrient environment with respect to physical  processes and/or biological uptake and regeneration processes.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: All data are available one year after collection.

Use constraints: No use constraints after one year after collection other than giving proper citation to the data origin.

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
